players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked that Bob is dead! We need to figure out who could have done this. Does anyone have any information that might help us identify the mafia member?"
Charlie: "I agree with Alice that we need to find the mafia member. Based on my investigation last night, I believe Alice is the one who killed Bob and is currently part of the mafia."
Diana: "I'm skeptical of Charlie's accusation against Alice. Let's consider all the facts before jumping to conclusions."
Charlie: "I stand by my accusation against Alice. Last night, I investigated her and discovered that she was the one who killed Bob. We cannot let the mafia continue to harm innocent villagers."
